3: Seems like the abandoned unmanned factory is back in operation...
But what comes off the assembly line are no ordinary Mechanoids, but the Corrupted with high Punishing levels.
Yeah, that's the only way to find out what happened.
The Corrupted increase in number the closer you get to the factory...
Oh, hey guys... long time no see.
You should see the look on your face, Commandant.
Glad I get to witness the last moment before you all get crushed by the Corrupted.
Hmm, it's about time my special order gets delivered...
By all means prove me wrong by staying alive.
Heavy thumps come from the unmanned factory.
